Html:
I started getting TIMEOUTs from pingtest.net

I turned off my firewall, AVirus, switched from wifi to wired, and I still get timeout.
In DOS "ping pingtest.net" returns one successful ping.

FIX: I change host from pingtest.net to google.com and now it works...

Anyone know why this fixes it or what I am missing?

Thanks!
cellurl
p.s. changed to pingtest.com, works for now
